name: selenologist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a scientist who studies the physical features of the moon: By 1924 selenologists were challenging the volcanic analogy for the origin of the craters on the moon.
More examplesFewer examplesThe selenologist gazes at the moon.If possible, the field selenologist will sight some distant reference point and pace toward it.
